title: HGroup
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The HTML <hgroup> element represents a multi-level heading for a section of a document.

usageExamples.title: Basic Example
usageExamples.description: An example of using <hgroup> with nested <h1> and <h2> headings.

usageExamples.title: Structure Example
usageExamples.description: An example using multiple nested <hgroup> elements for different heading levels.
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/hgroup
	/h1
		Main Title
	/hgroup
		/h2
			Sub Title
		/hgroup
			/h3
				Sub Sub Title
